title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Marinated chicken breasts are grilled to tender perfection and topped with a quick honey mustard sauce and garden-fresh toppings

title: Fried Chicken Sandwich
description: This fried chicken sandwich is ultra crispy on the outside, tender & juicy on the inside and bursting with flavour all over!

title: Rotini Fiorentina
description: A comforting pasta dish with an incredibly flavorful creamy tomato sauce and lots of mozzarella.

title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
description: This fresh pasta is tossed in a tangy vinaigrette & filled with veggies.

title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Sweet BBQ sauce, chopped chicken, red onions, a dash of cilantro, and tons of cheese.

title: Personal Pizza
description: Building your own pizzas and tailor it fit your, dietary need, taste preference etc.

title: Vegan/Gluteen Free Mediterranean Pizza
description: Made with spinach, black olives, artichokes, red onion, and crumbled feta, this pizza is full of flavor. Vegetarian, gluteen free and purely delicious

title: All American Cheese Burger
description: American cheese with lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, catsup, mayonaise and a free 1/2 pound ground chuck patty

title: Dutch French Fries
description: These are not your typical fries, they are broad, strong, and a little chunky.

title: Pumpkin Spice - Cupcake
description: These hearty pumpkin cupcakes are topped with a cinnamon cream cheese frosting. Delicious in the fall for a tasty treat.

title: Cookies and Cream - Cupcake
description: These Oreo cupcakes will melt in your mouth and that cookies and cream frosting on top is nearly too good too be true.

title: Muddy Buddy Cupcakes - Cupcake
description: These chocolate peanut butter cupcakes are a perfect reliable gourmet cupcake recipe.

title: Funfetti - Cupcake
description: These fancy cupcakes have a surprise inside and frosting with sprinkles on top!

title: Vanilla Salted Carmel - Cupcake
description: The center is made from melted salted caramel and then topped with a beautiful buttercream

title: Red White and Blue - Cupcake
description: We fill this vanilla cupcake with berry goodness and top it with raspberry fluff icing.

title: Red Velvet - Cupcake
description: These are dessert decadence featuring a golden oreo in the middle of red velvet cake and topped with white icing for a stunning finish.

title: Mississippi Mud - Cupcake
description: Luscious decadent chocolate cake filled with smooth chocolate fudge, topped with velvety chocolate frosting and real chocolate pieces.

title: Vegan/Gluten Free Vanilla - Cupcake
description: It marries the flavors of orange and cranberry in a delicious handheld confection.

title: German Chocolate - Cupcake
description: This chocolate-based cupcake and a cup of hot coffee sound like a match made in heaven.

title: Nutella Cupcakes - Cupcake
description: Did you know that Nutella is made from ground hazelnuts? It's true!

title: Chocolate Cheesecake - Cupcake
description: Creamy and smooth mini cheesecakes cupcakes with Oreo crust at the bottom.
